name: Ten Second First Dates
description:
Get ready for extreme speed dating! You have only 10 seconds to impress each potential date by matching as many emojis as possible.

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51, with the theme "every 10 seconds".

  • Design: Rose and Celia
  • Code: Celia
  • Art: Rose
  • Music: https://www.bensound.com
  • Sound effects: https://freesound.org
